short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A generic client application for retrieving an OAuth 2.0 bearer token using the implicit grant flow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The purpose of this application is to allow you to retrieve an OAuth 2.0 bearer token using the implicit grant flow, without having to develop a client application - i.e., this a generic client application.

New in version 0.7.10

Updated profile handling
